DOC.brief_title: Case Collection Study Determine Accuracy , Call Back Cancer Detection Rates QT Ultrasound Breast Imaging
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicenter , multi-arm case collection study , IRB approval . The study follow adaptive design initially plan total enrollment approximately 350 case include benign malignant case , representative tissue density . The image clinical data accrue prospective case collection use creation database facilitate future reader 's study , publication , build teach file , future marketing QT Ultrasound .
